title: Spaghetti
ingredients: Pasta, tomato sauce, salt, pepper, garlic
instructions: Boil pasta, add sauce, add salt, pepper, garlic

title: Salad
instructions: Chop lettuce, tomato, cucumber, add dressing

title: Chicken Curry
ingredients: Chicken, curry powder, coconut milk, onions, garlic, ginger
description: A flavorful and spicy chicken curry.
instructions: Cook chicken, add onions, garlic, ginger, curry powder, coconut milk

title: Pancakes
ingredients: Flour, eggs, milk, sugar, baking powder

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter bread, add cheese, grill until golden brown

title: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: Flour, sugar, cocoa powder, eggs, milk, butter
description: A rich and moist chocolate cake.

title: Fried Rice
description: A delicious and savory fried rice.
instructions: Cook rice, add eggs, vegetables, soy sauce

title: Pasta Carbonara
description: A creamy and flavorful pasta dish.
instructions: Cook pasta, fry bacon, add eggs, cheese, garlic

title: Tacos
ingredients: Tortillas, ground beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, salsa
description: A tasty and satisfying taco meal.
instructions: Cook beef, chop lettuce, tomato, add cheese, salsa

title: Apple Pie
description: A sweet and comforting apple pie.
instructions: Peel and slice apples, mix with sugar, cinnamon, bake in pie crust
